item.title: Choosing Hugo for This Site
item.description: I realized that I wanted to make a semi-professional website for myself. I won’t go too far into the reasoning in this post, but basically I thought I have enough projects and experience under my belt to warrant creating something like this now. Going into this endeavor, I know I had a few requirements for a website. Whatever website I end up choosing needed to be able to do the following:

item.title: Fenteale
item.description: I am the creator of this website. Check out more info about me via my about page.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to my website! I plan on using this blog section to post about various topics that I spend time researching or figuring out. For example, I plan on making the first real post on here about my research into static site generators, and why I chose Hugo over other ones such as Jekyll. If you ever have questions over any of the topics I cover, or have any comments to make, please feel free to visit my contact page to reach out to me.

item.title: Projects
item.description: This page is WIP but to see what I have been working on check out my github. Click here to check out a live demo of this repository: Fendemo

item.title: Contact
item.description: You can contact me via my email: fenteale@protonmail.com

item.title: About
item.description: I am a Computer Engineering Undergraduate student graduating spring 2023. More info coming soon
